scripts.rag:sync: npm run ingest && npm run reindex
scripts.rag:status: jq '.chunks | length' ingested/index.json || echo '(installe jq pour ce check)'
scripts.deploy: git add sources.csv ingested/index.json && git commit -m "feat(rag): refresh $(date -u +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%MZ')" || echo 'nothing to commit' && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:full: git add sources.csv ingested/index.json ingested/*.md && git commit -m "feat(rag): refresh (+md) $(date -u +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%MZ')" || echo 'nothing to commit' && git push origin main
scripts.rag:all: npm run rag:sync && npm run rag:status && npm run deploy
scripts.rag:events:sync: npm run shopify:events && git add public/events.json && git commit -m "data(events): refresh $(date -u +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%MZ')" || echo 'nothing to commit' && git push origin main
